changes: Added R4G4 texture decoder, fixes rupee count not displaying in Twilight Princess.
Use correct texture clear in LatteDraw_handleSpecialState8_clearAsDepth, fixes Yoshi's Woolly World not launching.
Added R5G6B5 decoder, fixes missing textures in Super Mario 3D World.
Added R5G6B5 texture format bypass, allows many games such as BOTW to run.
Disabled blending for integer formats, fixes error that occurred when launching Mario Kart 8.
Added bypass for R5G5B5A1, R4B4G4A4 and R4G4 texture formats, allows many games to run.
Fix timing clock, allows many games to boot and stops many games from running far too quickly.
